A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is not worth a second viewing. They killed so many characters so they could have a new ¨rebellion¨ and the lightsaber effects was really bad\, especially that last fight. Some effects were cool but most of it looked like a video game\, Yoda should've been cgi because that puppet looked horrible. The overall plot is still a bit fuzzy to me. I won't compare it to other SW movies but this is not something i'd like to see again.
